text: Cody Cassidy (born June 26, 1981) is a Canadian steer wrestler, and a five time Canadian Finals Rodeo champion. Cassidy was born on June 26, 1981, in Bashaw, Alberta, Canada. In 2010, he qualified for the National Finals Rodeo, and also won the Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo. His brother is fellow steer wrestler Curtis Cassidy. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Steer wrestlers Category:Canadian sportsmen Category:Sportspeople from Alberta
title: Cody Cassidy
